data: At the last minute we learned that the girl we had counted upon to do our cooking at Clover Lodge had scarlet fever, and as she was the only local girl that we could hire—New England girls preferring to work in a “shop” to domestic service—we were at our wits’ end.

AT the last minute we learned that the girl we had counted upon to do our cooking at Clover Lodge had scarlet fever, and as she was the only local girl that we could hire—New England girls preferring to work in a “shop” to domestic service—we were at our wits’ end.
Minerva's Manoeuvres: The Cheerful Facts of a "Return to Nature"
Loomis, Charles Battell, 1861-1911; Gruger, Frederic Rodrigo, 1871-1953 [Illustrator]
